casebody.data:
BEATTY, Petitioner, v. SUPERIOR COURT, Respondent. No. 8800; February 15, 1883. Mandamus to Compel the Superior Court to Place a Cause on Appeal from a justice’s court on the calendar, and proceed with the trial thereof, issued on authority of Ward v. Superior Court, 58 Cal. 519.1 Mandamus.

Wm. H. H. Hart for petitioner; Henly & Oates for respondent.

Cited in Acker v. Superior Court, 68 Cal. 246, 9 Pac. 110, as authority for holding that the defendant might be forced by mandamus to proceed to try a ease, appealed from a justice of the peace, on law and fact, where, instead of so- trying the case, the court has remanded it to the justice for trial de novo.

 By the COURT.

On authority of Ward v. Superior Court of Marin County, 58 Cal. 519, let the writ issue.
